nodes.text: Targonn was a planet located in the Outer Rim Territories. This mountainous planet was the homeworld of the sentient Targonnian species. It was ruled by Dictator-Forever Craw until it was liberated by the Revoltists with the help of C-3PO and R2-D2.
The 1999 reference book C-3PO: Tales of the Golden Droid states that Targonn is located in the Periphery region.
